comment: Cancelled subscribe and save item months ago .. appeared back on acct w / out my permission . Now I have to wait for refund .

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / cancel-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / and

                        :op2 (s2 / save-01

                  :time (b / before

            :op2 (a3 / appear-01

comment: I'm sorry for the trouble . Are you successfully unsubscribed to the item now ? Was the refund request confirmed for you ? ^ JW
